name: Capcom Puzzle World
description:
Throw down and bust out with the ultimate puzzle collection. Capcom® Puzzle World is about going back to the basics – pure intensity, pure challenge and pure fun! Includes Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo®, three Buster Bros. games, and co-op Block Block.

Capcom® Puzzle World © 2007 CAPCOM CO., LTD., © 2007 CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. Buster Bros. ©2006 HUDSON SOFT.
